column1: Throughout interphase, human Myt1 localizes to the endoplasmic reticulum and Golgi complex, whereas Cdc2 - cyclin B1 complexes shuttle between the nucleus and the cytoplasm.
The budding yeast spindle pole body ( SPB) not only organizes the astral and nuclear microtubules but is also associated with a number of cell - cycle regulators that control mitotic exit.

Our observations demonstrate that Mad2p localization at NPCs is sensitive to nuclear levels of Ran and suggest that release of Mad2p from NPCs is closely linked with spindle assembly checkpoint activation in yeast.
